purpleculture_pinyin:
lì
grain; granule; classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
зерно; гранула; классификатор для мелких круглых предметов (горох, пули, арахис, пилюли, крупы и т. д.)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A sage is using rice to fill up a vase, but as an exercise in patience, he's doing it grain by grain.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " rice " to "立" sound, the original meaning is the grain of rice. "Shuowen": "Cong Ye. From the rice, stand up sound." "Guliang Chuan-Zhaogong Nineteenth Year": "(Prince Xu Zhi) weeping, porridge is not allowed to be grained."

" Grains " can generally refer to granular things. Tang Huangtao "The Inscription of Master Guzhenjue of Xuefeng Mountain in Fuzhou": "Wu Chen year spring and March, showing illness. My king goes to the doctor, and he will receive the medicine.

" Grains " also means eating grains. "Shu‧Yiji": "Huamin is a grain." Kong Chuan: "Rice is a grain."

" Grains " is also used as a quantifier to quantify small, granular things. Tang Zhengyao "Shang Nong": "A grain of red rice, a few drops of cow blood."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " rice " to "立", the original meaning is the grain of rice.
humanum_full_description:
從「米」，「立」聲，本義為穀米之粒。《說文》：「糂也。从米，立聲。」《穀梁傳‧昭公十九年》：「（許太子止）哭泣，歠饘粥，嗌不容粒。」

　　「粒」可泛指粒狀之物。唐黃滔〈福州雪峰山故真覺大師碑銘〉：「戊辰年春三月，示疾。吾王走毉，毉至，粒藥以授。」

　　「粒」也表示以穀米為食。《書‧益稷》：「烝民乃粒。」孔傳：「米食曰粒。」

　　「粒」還用作量詞，量化細小粒狀之物。唐鄭遨〈傷農〉：「一粒紅稻飯，幾滴牛頷血。」
humanum_short_description: 從「米」，「立」聲，本義為穀米之粒。

①成颗的东西，细小的固体：米粒。盐粒。颗粒。粒子(ａ．成果的、细小的东西，“子”读轻声；b．指“基本粒子”，物理学上指构成物体的最简单的物质)。
②量词，多指颗粒状的东西：一粒米。一粒珍珠。[合]粒食(以米谷为食)；粒米束薪(极言粮草之少)；粒米狼戾(谷粒撒得满地都是。形容粮食充盈。)

粒(つぶ): grain

從「 米 」，「 立 」聲，本義為穀米之粒。《說文》：「糂也。从米，立聲。」《穀梁傳‧昭公十九年》：「（許太子止）哭泣，歠饘粥，嗌不容粒。」 「 粒 」可泛指粒狀之物。唐黃滔〈福州雪峰山故真覺大師碑銘〉：「戊辰年春三月，示疾。吾王走毉，毉至，粒藥以授。」 「 粒 」也表示以穀米為食。《書‧益稷》：「烝民乃粒。」孔傳：「米食曰粒。」 「 粒 」還用作量詞，量化細小粒狀之物。唐鄭遨〈傷農〉：「一粒紅稻飯，幾滴牛頷血。」
From " rice" to " 立" sound, the original meaning is the grain of rice. "Shuowen": "Cong Ye. From the rice, stand up sound." "Guliang Chuan-Zhaogong Nineteenth Year": "(Prince Xu Zhi) weeping, porridge is not allowed to be grained." " Grains" can generally refer to granular things. Tang Huangtao "The Inscription of Master Guzhenjue of Xuefeng Mountain in Fuzhou": "Wu Chen year spring and March, showing illness. My king goes to the doctor, and he will receive the medicine. " Grains" also means eating grains. "Shu‧Yiji": "Huamin is a grain." Kong Chuan: "Rice is a grain." " Grains" is also used as a quantifier to quantify small, granular things. Tang Zhengyao "Shang Nong": "A grain of red rice, a few drops of cow blood."

粒字的基本解释

粒
lì
成颗的东西，细小的固体：米粒。盐粒。颗粒。粒子（ａ．成果的、细小的东西，“子”读轻声；ｂ．指“基本粒子”，物理学上指构成物体的最简单的物质）。
量词，多指颗粒状的东西：一粒米。一粒珍珠。

粒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》力入切，入緝，來。］
(1)谷米之粒。
(2)泛指粒状之物。
(3)以谷米为食。
(4)量词。用于细小粒状之物。

粒字的英文翻译

◎ 粒
grain, granule

粒字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　粒； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页907第22
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?力入切，音立。米粒也。【小爾雅】生曰穀謂之粒。【孟子】樂歲粒米狼戾。【註】粒米，粟米之粒也。【拾遺記】員嶠之山名環丘，粟生穟高五丈，其粒皎然如玉。　又【說文】糂也。【書·益稷】烝民乃粒。【傳】米食曰粒。【疏】今人謂飯爲米糂，遺餘之飯，謂之一粒兩粒，是米食曰粒，用米爲食之名也。【禮·王制】有不粒食者矣。　又通作立。【詩·周頌】立我烝民。【註】立、粒通。

粒字的源字形

粒字的起名意思

：多指颗粒状的东西，形容粮食；同“立”，表立刻、马上。

grain
Basic explanation of words
grain
lì
Something into a grain, a small solid: rice grains. Salt grains. Particles. Particles (a. Fruitful, small things, "zi" read softly; b. Refers to "elementary particles", physics refers to the simplest matter that constitutes an object).
Quantifier, usually refers to a granular thing: a grain of rice. A pearl.
grain
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" forcefully cuts, enters, come. ]
(1) Grains of rice.
(2) Refers to granular things in general.
(3) Feed on rice.
(4) Quantifiers. Used for fine granular materials.

[Uncollected first] [Mi Zi Department] 　 grain; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 907 22
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Force into the cut, sound standing. Rice grains too. [Xiao Erya] Sheng said the grain of the valley. [Mencius] Happy Sui Lian Mi Wolfe. [Note] The grain of rice is also the grain of corn. 【Supplements】Yuanqiao Mountain is known as Huanqiu. The millet is five feet high, and its grains are as bright as jade.　【Said Wen】Cao Ye. [Book·Yiji] Suimin is a granule. [Biography] Rice is called grains. [Sparse] Nowadays people call rice glutinous rice, and the leftover rice is called one grain and two grains. It is the name of rice called grain, and rice is the name of food. [Rite · King System] There are those who do not eat grains.　Recommended. 【Poetry·Zhou Song】Let me see people. [Note] Li and Litong.

Пиктофонетические символы.
Рис выражает смысл, его образ подобен рисовому стеблю и рисовому зерну; Ли (h) выражает звук, Ли Чувэнь похож на стоящего человека с одним значением, и рисовые зерна также существуют индивидуально.
Первоначальное значение - рис.
Позже относится к общим частицам.

Radicals: 米, 立  (rice, stand)
Meaning Mnemonic
The part of rice that stands up tall in the air (at the end of the stalks) is the grains.
If you think about this one it'll make good sense. Just imagine rice stalks standing up into the air.
Reading Mnemonic
You have a box of grains. Ryuu (りゅう) from Street Fighter is doing training by punching the grains to strengthen his fingers.
He has his hands flat, and stabs his hands into the grains. Yah! Yah! Yah!
